text: Yara mumina, tara baleh ekati sura nayila haya na kena? Atahpara yakhana kona dbyarthahina sura nayila haya ebam tate jehadera ullekha kara haya, takhana yadera antare roga ache, apani taderake mrtyubhaye murchaprapta manusera mata apanara dike takiye thakate dekhabena. Sutaram dhbansa tadera jan'ye.
